page.title: 17The village Milkman _Bramley
page.content: { Our village milkman is Gilbert 'Gig' {Goulsbra,}age 63, born in Bramley in 1922. That was the year his father began the round. Gig began when he was 5, delivering milk in churns, before and after school. He went full_time at 14. He still lives in the bungalow which his father built in 1926, the year of the General Strike. { He begins his day at 4.30am.}He will deliver milk and other dairy products like butter, yoghurt, and eggs, door to door until 9.00 am.He works longer hours on the days he collects money from his customers. { He and his 2 sons deliver 2000 {pint bottles a day.}The milk he sells is already bottled by Northern Dairies. It is collected from the lock up fridges on a local industrial estate.
